text: Surviving Sepsis Campaign 1-hour Bundle® * Measure lactate level (follow serial measurements if initial level >2mmol/L) * Obtain blood cultures prior to administering antibiotics * Administer broad spectrum antibiotics * Begin rapid administration of 30mL/kg of crystalloid for hy- potension or lactate >4mmol/L « Start vasopressors if patient is hypotensive during or after fluid resuscitation to maintain a MAP >65 mmHg * Levy MM, Evans LE, Rhodes A. The surviving sepsis campaign bundle: 2018 update. Intensive care medicine. 2018 Jun 1; 44 (6):925—8.
